english_example_sentence: Dear students, read this important book carefully.
russian_example_sentence: Дорогие студенты, внимательно прочитайте эту важную книгу.
turkish_example_sentence: Değerli öğrenciler, bu önemli kitabı dikkatlice okuyun.
